title: Consider the Purpose of Sketching
text: Sketching helps in quickly visualizing and iterating on ideas.

title: Think About the Speed of Sketching
text: Sketching allows for rapid exploration of different concepts.

title: Focus on the Iterative Process
text: Sketching is beneficial for making quick changes and improvements.

title: Avoid Misconceptions
text: Sketching is not primarily for making the presentation look colorful.

title: Clarify the Role of Sketching
text: Sketching is not about avoiding digital tools but enhancing idea development.

title: Understand the Goal of Sketching
text: Sketching is not meant to ensure the final design is perfect.
